title: ZipReg
author: ZipReg
created_time: September 14, 2022, 12:39:12 AMLast edit: September 14, 2022, 07:47:51 PM by ZipReg
content: Greetings everyone, I hope you're all doing well! All proceeds from this auctionwill be donated to HODLONAUT!You are bidding on The Times Traveler #001 ProofA 1.5" Gallery Wrapped 16x20 Canvas,hand numbered and signed with COA.As a special BONUS, I will include:(1) BONUS ROUND SCRATCH OFF GAME Ticket.A hand made, one of a kind, unscratched ticket designed for use inThe Times Traveler #001 Canvas Crypto Puzzle Contest!The concept of the piece: "THE TIMES TRAVELER"In the future the secret of time travel is discovered. A time traveler goes back in time and convincesThe Times to run an alternate front page article on Jan. 3rd 2009, after revealing to them the bitcoin whitepaper,and genesis block code that embeds the famously quote "Chancellor on brink of second bailout" headline thathad yet to be printed! Replacing the Israel sends troops into Gaza headline with a message to the Worldfrom a verified time traveler, on the day that bitcoin and it's blockchain were created.Caption below time machine photo: "Today will go down in history as the day a verified time traveler revealedthat bitcoin will in the near future become the #1 trusted worldwide currency." Starting bid: 0.01BTCBid Increments: 0.001BTCEnd date and time:  Thursday, Sept 15th. 2022 at 3pm PST. Countdown TimerShipping: Actual cost paid by winner. Any Import/VAT taxes are to be paid by winner.Sniping: Any bid made within the last 5 minutes of the auctionwill extend the auction 5 minutes, any additional bid within thatextended time shall further extend the auction 5 additional minutes.Excluded from Bidding: I may exclude any bidder at my sole discretion. Payment: Will PM winner with detailsThank You & Good Luck!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: garciaor2002 on September 15, 2022, 03:10:25 AM.011BTCCurrent winning bid!Ends in less than 3 hours!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: garciaor2002 on September 15, 2022, 03:10:25 AM.011BTCWinner! Congrats buddy  will reach out shortly!
